Package com.i2group.apollo.security

Contains a supplied implementation of a principal provider that maps dimension values to WebSphere roles.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
SimpleUserDataSourceProvider A simple implementation of IUserDataSourceProvider that enables all users to access all external DataSources.
WebSphereRoleBasedPrincipalProvider A WebSphere-specific implementation of IPrincipalProvider that maps the roles of the Principal to values in the available access and grant SecurityDimensions.
 

Package com.i2group.apollo.security Description

Contains a supplied implementation of a principal provider that maps dimension values to WebSphere roles.

Since:
4.0
